pkgmetadata.longdescription: Alchemize - Simple de/serialization for Python===============================================Alchemize is designed to be a simple serialization and deserializationlibrary for Python. The primary use-case for Alchemize is to allow forusers to quickly build ReST clients using simple model mappings totransform data from Python objects to a serializable form and vice-versa.The power of Alchemize is that you can use it to augment existingmodel structures from other libraries. For example, you can use Alchemizeto easily serialize your ORM models.Installation--------------Alchemize is available on PyPI.. code-block:: shell pip install alchemize* Documentation: `ReadTheDocs <http://alchemize.readthedocs.org>`_* Travis CI: |travis|* Coverage: |codecov|.. |travis| image:: https://travis-ci.org/jmvrbanac/alchemize.svg :target: https://travis-ci.org/jmvrbanac/alchemize.. |codecov| image:: https://codecov.io/gh/jmvrbanac/alchemize/branch/master/graph/badge.svg :target: https://codecov.io/gh/jmvrbanac/alchemize
